name: José C. Monteiro
content: Jose Monteiro Personal WWW Page Welcome to the homepage of José Monteiro Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Instituto Superior Técnico Universidade de Lisboa Academic Agregação (Habilitation) in Computer Science and Engineering in 2012 from Instituto Superior Técnico (IST). PhD in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science in 1996 from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). MSc in Electrical and Computer Engineering in 1992 from Instituto Superior Técnico (IST). Licenciatura (5-year engineering degree) in Electrical and Computer Engineering in 1989 from Instituto Superior Técnico (IST). Research Senior researcher in the Optimization and Simulation Algorithms Research Group (ALGOS) group at (INESC-ID). Research interests are in the area of Computational Systems, namely: high-performance computing parallel computing synthesis and verification algorithms computer architecture low power systems Please get in touch with me if you're interested in pursuing research work in fields related to these. List of projects I have led and participated in. Please check my publications here. Teaching Courses I'm currently teaching. I'm a co-author of the IST Press book on basic computer architecture (in Portuguese): Arquitectura de Computadores: dos Sistemas Digitais aos Microprocessadores G. Arroz, J. Monteiro, A. Oliveira IST Press 1st edition February 2007, 2nd edition July 2009, 3rd edition December 2012 Companion site, with extra material.
